name: AMAX Global Services
overview:
AMAX Global Services (AGS) is a software development and offshore outsourcing business partner that is headquartered in Fremont, California and leverages its Offshore Development Centers strategically located in Shanghai and Suzhou, China.

We are dedicated to providing value added services with highly qualified and skilled software engineers. Our expertise is in providing solutions for companies of various sizes from software startups to Fortune 500 companies. We provide value added services encompassing the complete product delivery lifecycle at very attractive rates.

We offer a full range of high quality services:

Application Development and Maintenance Consulting and Implementation Testing Services (performance, scalability, security, compatibility) English, Chinese and Japanese localization and language expertise Dedicated Offshore Development Centers to protect confidentiality and intellectual property Remote IT Infrastructure Support
